categories: Category:Hyperspace: The Official Star Wars Fan Club

nodes.text: "Precipice" is a short story written by Chris Cassidy, originally exclusive to Hyperspace. On October 1, 2012, it was republished on Suvudu, a subsidiary website of Random House publishing. The story is a retelling of the confrontation between the captive Obi-Wan Kenobi and Dooku in Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones.
